name: dailycode
description: Stay motivated and keep your coding streak alive with DailyCode! Designed to help developers build a daily coding habit, this extension tracks your coding activity across projects, giving you real-time insights into your progress. Whether you're aiming for a personal record or just want to stay consistent.
author: SiphosakheMkhwanazi

commands.title: DailyCode: Reset Streak
commands.description: Manually reset your coding streak.(NOT REVERSIBLE AND NOT RECOMMENDED)

commands.title: DailyCode: Show Coding Streak
commands.description: Show your coding streak in a popup notification.

commands.title: DailyCode: Set Min Code Changes
commands.description: Set the minimum number of code changes to count as a coding day.

commands.title: DailyCode: Get Min Code Changes
commands.description: Get the current minimum number of code changes.
